title: Anger as 'deplorable' dresses banned from teenage disco in Kilkenny
text: Anger as 'deplorable' dresses banned from teenage disco in Kilkenny Independent.ie A Facebook status shared by an Irish teenage disco stating that 'deplorable' dresses are banned has sparked outrage online. http://www.independent.ie/style/fashion/fashion-news/anger-as-deplorable-dresses-banned-from-teenage-disco-in-kilkenny-35450012.html http://www.independent.ie/incoming/article35450039.ece/30bba/AUTOCROP/h342/fusion4.PNG Image: Fusion Ball Kilkenny/Facebook A Facebook status shared by an Irish teenage disco stating that 'deplorable' dresses are banned has sparked outrage online. Image: Getty Image: Fusion Ball Kilkenny/Facebook Image: Fusion Ball Kilkenny/Facebook Image: Fusion Ball Kilkenny/Facebook A Facebook status shared by an Irish teenage disco stating that 'deplorable' dresses are banned has sparked outrage online.
